lead_paragraph: KASHA--Audrey Sission, a lifelong New Yorker, born December 30, 1927, died June 12, 2016. Daughter of the late Helene Sisson-Cerussi and Theodore R. Sisson; mother of the late Matthew P. Kasha; sister of B. Peter Cerussi and Maxine L. Sisson and Gloria M. Cerussi. Graveside service Friday, June 17, 11am, Warwick Cemetery, Warwick, NY. Contributions in her memory to an animal welfare group of your choice would be appreciated. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KASHA, AUDREY SISSION
